Description

VirtualDJ is the hottest AUDIO and VIDEO mixing software, targeting DJs from the bedroom, mobile, and professional superstars like Carl Cox.

Features

1. One-click beat matching and synchronization (FAME algorithm)
2. BeatLock engine for keeping songs in-sync and in-time
3. Dynamic beat-matching visualizer
4. Automatic beat-matched crossfading
5. Automatic BPM and KEY calculation
6. Automatic pitch matching
7. Automatic audio gain matching
8. Real scratch simulation
9. Automatic seamless and beat-aware LOOP functionality
10. Synchronized sampler with 12 instant record and playback slots
